BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now dev] Update `yarn` to v1.17.3 (#2780) * [now dev] Update `yarn` to v1.17.3 * Wait longer for angular integration test It keeps on failing * Only run angular test on Node 10.x * Revert "Wait longer for angular integration test" This reverts commit 19d70d4ba9aee49a5114b65f00ef97e2a88dc7ef.
